name: Envirosis Environmental Consulting Co.
overview:
Entered into force “Environmental Control Regulation” brings a wide range of new obligations are to many sectors. In this context

The list of the facilities or activities in Annex-1 must set up environmental management units or employ environmental officer or take environmental management services from consulting firms until 31 December 2010. The list of the facilities or activities in Annex-2 must set up environmental management units or employ environmental officer or take environmental management services from consulting firms until 30 June 2010.

Functioning of the Environmental Management Services Includes:

* Establishment of appropriate environmental management system in your organization,
* Planning of monitoring and measuring activities, regular monitoring and reporting,
* Training and internal examinations,
* Environmental control,
* Environmental performance and risk assessment process.

[02] Environmental Consultancy

In the scope of Environmental Legislation Receiving the Permit and License Regulation brings a wide range of new obligations are to many sectors.

Functioning of the Environmental Permits and Licenses Services Includes:

* Waste management plan ,
* Receiving emission and discharge permits,
* Environmental Impact Assessment studies,
* Environmental modeling,
* Receiving license to new Newly established businesses (GSM),
* Comprehensive assessment legislation, permits and other licensing studying.

[03] Environmental Technology Application and Development

* Treatment plant capacity growth, development and improvement works,
* Solid, liquid and gas waste disposal or re-evaluation and allowing evaluation of the integration of systems,
* Efficient use of energy for the process improvement studies,
* Feasibility studies,
* Selection of appropriate technology.

[04] Project Supports

* Receiving appropriate grants supported by EU and national fund to a wide rang of business enterprises.
* After determination of the appropriate grant, project development and feasibility of the idea of the execution of the process. [more]
